Audio.Locality: Reserva Ecológica de Guapi Açu (REGUA), RJ
Audio.Author: Eric DeFonso
Audio.Comments: Extended cut of natural sounds at a presumed lek site. The conversation ends in a loud percussive flourish. The score refers to that flourish. The cycle repeats twice, and each cycle lasts about 1m 20s. Recorded from the Green Trail that heads into the higher hills of the reserve.bird-seen:noplayback-used:no
